item.title: Gallery with image processing
item.description: Demo with images from pixabay.com using shortcode: {{< res-gallery match="**/pixabay.com/*" caption-position="bottom" caption-effect="fade" hover-effect="slideup" >}} Company logo 1 Company logo 2 Company logo 3 Company logo 4 Company logo 5 Company logo 6 Seeberg 2825904 640 02 photocard 04 photocard 01 photocard 03 photocard 05 photocard 06 photocard 07 photocard 08 photocard 09 photocard Adventure 2528477 640 Blue 2863550 640 Coffee 2306471 640 Coffee 2608864 640 Coffee 2714970 640 Coffee beans 2258839 640 Coffee cup 2317201 640 Contact 2860030 640 Espresso 2892357 640 Faq Girl 2696947 640 Green 1738220 640 Light bulb 1002783 640 Logo google 1991840 640 Matrix 2326147 640 Mobile phone 426559 640 Monitor 1307227 640 Organic 1280537 640 Paint 2985569 640 Paperclip 178126 640 Parrot 2756488 640 Particles 1373684 640 Pencil 1067670 640 Seeberg 2825904 640 Still life 2366084 640 Tablet 313002 640 Wikimedia commons 679587 640 Person 1 Person 2 Person 3 Person 4 Person 5 Person 6 See more here More examples:

item.title: Image Processing (`res-figure`)
item.description: Image page resources can be resized and cropped. This only works for images which are page resources, not for images in the /static folder. This theme provides a shortcode res-figure for page resource image processing.
